title: Question 1 Point 8
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria and sample responses, and to score the response.
descriptions:

Question H: What name did Augustus give the city he rebuilt on the supposed ruins of Troy?

The correct response is:

  • Ilium
